mapper.select: SELECT GROUPID,GROUPNAME,PARENTID,GROUPTYPE,CHIEFIDS,CHIEFNAMES,COMPANYID FROM hm_pub_group WHERE PARENTID = '0' AND GROUPTYPE = #{type} AND COMPANYID = #{companyId}
SELECT GROUPID,GROUPNAME,PARENTID,GROUPTYPE,CHIEFIDS,CHIEFNAMES,COMPANYID FROM hm_pub_group WHERE PARENTID = #{deptId} AND COMPANYID = #{companyId}

SELECT gp.PARENTID GROUPID,IFNULL(SUM(a.orderNum),0) orderNum , c.lineNum FROM hm_pub_group gp LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT gs.GROUPID aid, SUM(stf.TODAYNUM) orderNum FROM hm_pub_staff stf RIGHT JOIN hm_pub_group_staff gs ON stf.COMPANYID = gs.COMPANYID AND stf.ID = gs.STAFFID WHERE stf.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND stf.ISDEL = 0 AND stf.ISLOCK =0 GROUP BY gs.GROUPID) a ON a.aid = gp.GROUPID LEFT JOIN (SELECT gp2.PARENTID GROUPID , IFNULL(SUM(b.lineNum),0) lineNum FROM hm_pub_group gp2 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT gs.GROUPID bid, COUNT(stf.STATUSFLAG = 1) lineNum FROM hm_pub_staff stf RIGHT JOIN hm_pub_group_staff gs ON stf.COMPANYID = gs.COMPANYID AND stf.ID = gs.STAFFID WHERE stf.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND stf.STATUSFLAG = 1 AND stf.ISDEL = 0 AND stf.ISLOCK =0 GROUP BY gs.GROUPID) b ON b.bid = gp2.GROUPID WHERE gp2.COMPANYID=#{companyId} GROUP BY gp2.PARENTID HAVING gp2.PARENTID != '0') c ON c.GROUPID = gp.PARENTID WHERE gp.COMPANYID=#{companyId} GROUP BY gp.PARENTID,c.GROUPID HAVING gp.PARENTID != '0'

SELECT gs.GROUPID ,SUM(stf.TODAYNUM) orderNum , b.lineNum FROM hm_pub_staff stf JOIN hm_pub_group_staff gs ON stf.COMPANYID = gs.COMPANYID AND stf.ID = gs.STAFFID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT gs.GROUPID bid, COUNT(stf.STATUSFLAG = 1) lineNum FROM hm_pub_staff stf JOIN hm_pub_group_staff gs ON stf.COMPANYID = gs.COMPANYID AND stf.ID = gs.STAFFID WHERE stf.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND stf.STATUSFLAG = 1 AND stf.ISDEL = 0 AND stf.ISLOCK =0 GROUP BY gs.GROUPID ) b ON b.bid = gs.GROUPID WHERE stf.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND stf.ISDEL = 0 AND stf.ISLOCK =0 GROUP BY gs.GROUPID,b.lineNum
